_description: Verses for parting lovers — six cross-rhymed quatrains

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Wherto shuld I expressmy inward heuynesno myrth can make me fayntyl that we mete agayne…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …Thus longe to enduretyll that we mete agayne
BLAdd31922.Note: Words and notation repeated twice more for further singing parts.
